newsitem.title: USA: AT&T Capital prices $200 mln of securities.
newsitem.headline: AT&T Capital prices $200 mln of securities.

text.p: AT&T Capital Corp said Tuesday that a newly-formed trust sponsored by AT&T Capital, Capita Preferred Trust, had priced $200 million of Perpetual Trust Originated Preferred Securities (TOPrS).
The price is $25 per share, a statement said.
Holders of the securities will be entitled to receive cash distributions at an annual percentage rate of 9.06 percent, which is guaranteed by AT&T Capital, the company said.
Merrill Lynch & Co is lead manager. Goldman, Sachs & Co, Lehman Brothers, PaineWebber Inc and Prudential Securities Inc are co-managers.
